member.name: F:Volo.Abp.UI.Navigation.ApplicationMenuItem.DefaultOrder
member.summary: Default value of a menu item.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.UI.Navigation.ApplicationMenuItem.Name
member.summary: Unique name of the menu in the application.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.UI.Navigation.ApplicationMenuItem.DisplayName
member.summary: Display name of the menu item.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.UI.Navigation.ApplicationMenuItem.Order
member.summary: The Display order of the menu. Default value: 1000.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.UI.Navigation.ApplicationMenuItem.Url
member.summary: The URL to navigate when this menu item is selected.

member.summary: Icon of the menu item if exists.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.UI.Navigation.ApplicationMenuItem.IsLeaf
member.summary: Returns true if this menu item has no child .

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.UI.Navigation.ApplicationMenuItem.Target
member.summary: Target of the menu item. Can be null, "_blank", "_self", "_parent", "_top" or a frame name for web applications.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.UI.Navigation.ApplicationMenuItem.IsDisabled
member.summary: Can be used to disable this menu item.

member.summary: Can be used to store a custom object related to this menu item. Optional.
